website_summaries.verdict: Easy-to-wear style that's effortless to slip into, but some customers prefer a slipper with more structure and support.
pros: An excellent choice for men who prefer a slipper that's easy to put on and take off, thanks to the simple scuff design
Ideal for lounging around the house
cons: The soles aren't as cushioned or supportive as other Ugg slippers
While some men love the fit, others found it slightly tight

customer_reviews.title: Atrocious
customer_reviews.text: These slippers where well worn, with flattened and shed fur at the heel and toe area, creases on top. Those should be sold under "worn - acceptable" category for half of the price. If I pay full price I expect a new, UNWORN, product. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: the most uncomfortable slippers in the world
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way these are real Uggs. These are the most uncomfortable slippers ever, it feels like someone put Pulled apart cotton balls on concrete and covered that with A cheap Tent of fabric. The dye on these comes off also! They are almost impossible to keep on the feet, and again, SO FLIPPING UNCOMFORTABLE!! I went to Target and bought off brand men’s slippers for $20 and they are amazing! Don’t waste your money, these are a rip off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Yellow 11

customer_reviews.title: The black die on these slippers comes off.
customer_reviews.text: The black die on these slippers comes off. Don't wear anything white. I had the sand colored ones and I thought I would try these. Didn't work out, they should have included a note in their listing (big print too) that the die bleeds. So disappointing, now I am stuck with bleeding slippers. Not Cool
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L. Moe

customer_reviews.title: Dyed feet but overall comfortable and wonderful shoes
customer_reviews.text: This item was as expected. Only thing that bothered my husband was that it left a black ring around the top of his foot where the dye of the shoe came off onto his foot. Otherwise they are very comfotable and the fit was as expected. I'd reccomend this item but in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: kayla

customer_reviews.title: OK slippers
customer_reviews.text: I expected more from these Uggs. I suppose they are all right for bedroom slippers, but not for much else. They don’t fit well, the instep is too low and they are hard to keep on your foot. All in all a disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J. Lombardi

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I dont typically buy UGG, but it was literally the ok only slipper I could find in a size 14 for my extremely big boyfriend. He likes them and they fit perfect. One thing I did notice though. If they get snow on the bottom of them, watch out. They are so slippery when you walk back inside. My boyfriend took out an entire hanging rack of our uniform shirts and hit the floor. He's fine.
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Ugg’s x 3
customer_reviews.text: The boys loved their Ugg’s and have them on at home, all the time!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: Great UGGS Are Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These UGGS slippers are identical to the pair ordered from Nordstrom online and given to my son last year. They fit beautifully, ordered as before using the same normal sizing, so if you wear a 13 - 13 1/2 I would recommend you to go up to size 14 as I did for him again. He loves them, saying they have a nice but comfortable snug fit initially that “wears” into the size of his wider feet. UGG is known for it’s reliability and comfort. The black suede exterior is handsome and he wears them constantly around the house winter through fall, and for the brief moments stepping outside on the stone patio walkway.
customer_reviews.author: debmorensync

customer_reviews.title: Wished that the sole was thicker and had more substance for comfort.
customer_reviews.text: The sole itself was very thin. There was not a lot of cushion to the foot. Although the slipper looked nice, it was far from cozy and comfortable. I was surprised since I have a couple pairs of Uggs slippers for myself and both pairs are luxurious and warm to the feet. I even bought 3 more slippers for my daughters this Xmas 2018. I was disappointed bc I specifically made this purchase for my husband's bday. But because I like my Ugg slippers so much, I will purchase another style from Uggs for my husband, hoping a different style will be better.
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: They just don't fit and the major problem is the width. I have a wide foot and read the reviews carefully. There were several reviews focused on width. The summary of those reviews was that they might start off a little tight, but would "mold" to the foot over time. That is a joke. I can't get my foot anywhere near the end of the toe to let the slipper "mold". For what these cost, I was expecting something much better. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Sundborg

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved his.
customer_reviews.text: He had the black pair and only wears them around the house and outside once in a while. He's was always looking for some comfortable "house shoes". These Uggs are exactly what he needed. Yes, they cost a little more, but "you get what you pay for". We highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in nicely, better than the cheap stuff but still overpriced
customer_reviews.text: Initially I gave these 2 stars because they are overpriced and I was underwhelmed by them. I bought a less expensive pair thinking they would be better and boy was I wrong. After wearing the UGGs for about a week they grew on me. The only drawback and it's a big one is that it's lacking on cushion. If it were a little thicker on the sole, I'd a given it 5 stars but it's a generous 4 stars considering it's still a little overpriced. Should be not a penny more than $50 imo. Good slipper overall, needs improvement
customer_reviews.author: Andy

customer_reviews.title: Damage quickly
customer_reviews.text: Really nice looking slippers. Sole is so thin it makes your heel hurt, but that’s not what these are about. They are cozy and really good looking slippers. Material is exactly what fans of Ugg have come to love. Three stars is because I dropped one spot of melted butter and they are ruined. Purchased Ugg cleaner and It just made them worse. Wish the material was more durable. Especially for the price, should be longer lasting... #bummed
customer_reviews.author: lori cadman

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable on skin
customer_reviews.text: I ordered several pairs of slippers after a knee injury when I couldn’t bend my knee enough to easily put on shoes. The feel of these on bare skin was much better than the others. While wearing socks or going outside, other slippers with low heels and thicker padding were better, but for post-shower or scuffing around the house these feel great and are now my go-to slippers. Fit perfect without socks, might be a bit small if wearing socks.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are great! Super comfortable, obviously well-made. I got them for my boyfriend who wears his slippers everywhere. Walking the dogs, going to the mailbox, getting coffee... Needless to say, he goes through $25 slippers like water. These came 2 months ago, and they barely look worn. I have a lot of confidence that they'll last for years. For slippers, they're beautiful. He's very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: J Lar

customer_reviews.title: No!!!
customer_reviews.text: There’s no way this is the usual sheep fur used in UGG’s. We ordered these back around Christmas time for my father as a gift as he had gifted my mother and I REAL UGG slippers. I noticed these looked totally different and did not feel like ours. Do no waste your hard earned money on these slippers. They are def fake.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Best house shoes ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these UGG house shoes so much. I bought a pair 8 years ago and have been meaning to replace them for half that time. I loved them so much and forgot what we paid 8 years ago, I would have been willing to pay $180 for these, seriously. If you’re worried about accidentally sizing a tad bit tight, these will stretch a little over time. Otherwise the size is as I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Kay

customer_reviews.title: hard as rock
customer_reviews.text: these can't be "broken" in. They're hard as heck. husband used it for "inside" shoes and it's heavy and clonks around. we replaced these because his old ones were unfortunately vomited on by a friend lol and we couldn't get the..STINK out. Wish the old ones from UGGS were in stock, but it's never in stock in his size.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie

customer_reviews.title: Bit Tight -- Very little cushion
customer_reviews.text: I suppose its obvious this is like a slipper with almost 0 arch and padding on the heel. I had another pair of Ugg like this that I loved but I can't recall which.. but this wans't it. This is really kind of disappointing, but I can use it for indoor use. I dont think its viable for a long walk.. but for walking to the super market it can do. It is warm inside
customer_reviews.author: BigTimeGames

customer_reviews.title: Gift for my husband
customer_reviews.text: My husband is very hard on slippers and goes through a lot of them. I finally decided to pay more to see if they would be better quality and last longer. I am so glad that I did. He really likes them. You can use UGG products to waterproof and clean them which is what I have done. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: best slipper for the pandemic!
customer_reviews.text: I've had multiple UGG Ascot slippers but not the slip in type. Figured I'd give them a shot but also at a great price- why not? The moment i slipped them on i didn't want to take them off. The Ascot were great but these are way more comfortable and true to size. Like every pair of Uggs they do require a break time period. Looking forward to having these for awhile!
customer_reviews.author: Mk1524

customer_reviews.title: Expensive, but worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I tend to be, shall we say, “economical“ in my clothing purchases, so it was stretching some for me to buy these UGGs, but my wife talked me into it, and they are the most comfortable amazing slippers I have ever owned. She has a pair and assures me that they will last for years. Happy owner!
customer_reviews.author: Alan Bergfeld

customer_reviews.title: 4-months of use and shoes are already ruined
customer_reviews.text: Okay, I get that as we work from home during a pandemic, we tend to wear our slippers more than we used to, but 4-months of regular use should not render the shoes useless. I bought these in June 2020 and now, in October 2020, can barely wear them because the bottom inside material is so worn and ripped that it hurts to walk on. For an expensive brand like UGG I thought I'd be getting more use out of these. Extremely disappointed and won't be buying these again.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Turk

customer_reviews.title: UGG's and Disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I love UGG's and thought these expensive slippers would be true to UGG. However, there is zero protection on the bottom. Meaning there is no soul to speak of (super thin). For the price you would expect a better quality slipper. My 10 dollar slippers from Walmart are of better quality. Very Sad!!
customer_reviews.author: Kurt

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband for Christmas. His first pair of slippers and he is in LOVE. These are super comfortable and fluffy and they have lasted a long time. I love the hard soles on the bottom for those days where he has to run outside to fetch the mail in the early morning. They don’t let his little feet get cold!
customer_reviews.author: Ashlee

customer_reviews.title: 20 yr slippers
customer_reviews.text: I bought these exact slippers 20 yrs ago for my son and he just threw them out, he was so sad to let them go. I ordered another pair for him this Christmas and he was more excited about getting the exact slippers that he loved for 20 yrs, than the legos that he wanted ( he’s 31) he took off his shoes and wore them the rest of Christmas Day. Great product and well loved.
customer_reviews.author: Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I don’t understand why ugg puts there label right where your heal is. It’s definitely noticeable as you walk. If it wasn’t for that these would be a 5 star product. They are very warm, seem durable but only time with tell with that. If you are like me and just looking for something to wear around the house, look elsewhere. They cost way to much and have an annoying label.
customer_reviews.author: mike rana

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly very comfortable and enjoyable to wear
customer_reviews.text: Love these things. The sheep wool lining is heaven for my old diabetic feet. The are very comfortable and protect your feet. I never wear outside of the house, these are indoor slippers only.
customer_reviews.author: Mississippi kid

customer_reviews.title: Warmer than socks!
customer_reviews.text: These sheepskin Uggs are like nothing else. Get two pair and alternate wearing them, they will then last as long as four pair since they won't get worn down form being sweaty/damp. You can also wash Uggs, not often, but they will last for years if you keep them dry and clean!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Snappy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, great value
customer_reviews.text: These UGGs are a replacement from a pair we bought for our Sons many years ago. He absolutely loves them . So it ‘s going to make a great Christmas present. Thank You !!
customer_reviews.author: Gerome Y.

customer_reviews.title: PRE WORN DISGUSTING CONDITION!!!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers were pre worn when I received them. There were stains on the slippers, worn bottoms with pieces of dirt stuck to the bottom and dog hair in the slipper. These were returned and shipped back out without anyone checking them. They were a gift for my husband and this was embarrassing and disgusting!
customer_reviews.author: Bella Ferraro

customer_reviews.title: disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I am disappointed because they don't fit well, the instep is too low, the sole is too thin. I am going to return them ASAP.
customer_reviews.author: goodlife168

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful for indoors - Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This UGG slipper is comfortable and easy to slip on. This is my second pair of real UGG slippers. I ended up with a knockoff pair which on my second purchase. The first pair lasted 6 years, the knockoffs made it through a year and were never quite right. Delighted to have the real deal again!
customer_reviews.author: Jim Spray

customer_reviews.title: Knock-off’s
customer_reviews.text: Cheap imitation. These slippers are not comfortable like the ones I tried on in the store. While the fake fur keeps your feet warm, the bottoms have no padding so it feels like you’re walking on cardboard.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Kennedy

customer_reviews.title: Warm, no arch support.
customer_reviews.text: They look great but they have no arch support, which I knew before hand, these are just bathroom run in the middle of the night slippers. Very warm, which will come in handy bc I hate wearing socks at night.
customer_reviews.author: J C

customer_reviews.title: Size 15. woohoo!
customer_reviews.text: It’s SO DIFFICULT to find any slippers, let alone a decent looking and quality size15 for my boyfriend. He rated the fit for me. It’s a good looking slipper, I love UGG slippers. I’ve had my own pair for more then 8 years now. He wanted to rate it 4.5/5
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Fuzzy
customer_reviews.text: Great pair of warm slippers! May be a little goofy looking, but people stop laughing when they realize how long they last and how warm they are! My last pair lasted 5 years and were only retired after I accidentally walked through wood glue!
customer_reviews.author: Son of the Fresh

customer_reviews.title: Similar to Ugg but half the proce
customer_reviews.text: My son seems to like them just as much as his ugg slippers that he outgrew and these were half the price. Will have to see if they hold up as well long term but appear to be of good quality and construction
customer_reviews.author: Mommy of two

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers. I had bought another pair from a sister ugg brand and they just were not cutting it close to the ugg brand! These are soft and cushiony and so amazing!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Katie Eilyuk

customer_reviews.title: Can UGG slippers be worn to work?
customer_reviews.text: First bought these slippers in Australia and loved them since then. Went crazy when I realized I left them in Spain. Cried like a baby. Immediately searched for a new pair and got lucky. Feel sometimes I want to wear them to the office. 😁.
customer_reviews.author: Turtleboy

customer_reviews.title: Best slippers ever
customer_reviews.text: We love these Uggs slippers. We are actually buying these to replace older pairs that have served us well for years. Quality is exceptional and comfort is amazing! Buy these slippers! You won’t be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Norman R. Burkett

customer_reviews.title: Can’t Go Wrong
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband - what’s not to like - they’re Uggs !! So warm, so comfy and will last him a very long time since he’ll only wear them around the house. Well worth the investment !
customer_reviews.author: Stacy

customer_reviews.title: So warm and cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Comfort, quality and style this slipper has all of them. I bought this as a replacement pair for my husband. He would never had spent the money on himself, but he is happy I did. The last pair was still in pretty good shape, he really didn’t need to replace them, except the fur gets less fluffy. I’m pretty sure we could probably get them cleaned and they might be fluffy again. they lasted about 5 years, not to bad for a pair of slippers
customer_reviews.author: Tracey L Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Like walking on cardboard.
customer_reviews.text: The soles of these slippers were so thin- it was like walking on cardboard. The shoes were very plush and soft, but not where it mattered the most (on the soles). For the price, I would hope to have a significantly more comfortable slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great men's slippers
customer_reviews.text: Great men's scuff slippers which are hard to find. I bought these for my adult son to replace his d ones, the same. We have tile floors and these keep feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hubby loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loves them. His first pair. He requested a pair fir Xmas. I was surprised that a slipper was offered in a wide, which he prefers, so I ordered that. They are warm, and he loves the thick sole.
customer_reviews.author: joelou

customer_reviews.title: Great Slippers
customer_reviews.text: These were definitely legit Ugg’s and came in authentic packaging. Very comfortable and would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: James Smith

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: These are the real deal and worth the money. Real suede and sheep skin. Order one show size up. They will fit if you order exact size but will start out really tight. One size up is snug enough and when you do break them in they conform to your foot. Prefect. Got some for my dad too
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect slippers
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these slippers! I bought them a size larger than normal because he has a high arch and a wide foot and they fit him perfectly!!!
customer_reviews.author: dasnedd

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Great Xmas present. My feet get somewhat chilly and since getting these for Xmas have been toasty warm. No sweaty discomfort. Just soft warm.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Stallkamp

customer_reviews.title: Not sure I can keep not a good value
customer_reviews.text: I'm disappointed for uggs they don't have enough sheepskin on bottom of foot to heel, it seems like they cut corners, cheaped out, sadly not really what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: MGW

customer_reviews.title: Warm cozy slippers
customer_reviews.text: Nice cozy slippers but too warm for summer, also slammer than expected, order size up
customer_reviews.author: Alina Uzhvieva

customer_reviews.title: the sole is so thin and therefor in my opinion not comfortable and supporting at all
customer_reviews.text: Not worth the money, the sole is so thin and therefor in my opinion not comfortable and supporting at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves them
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my husband for his birthday and he loves them. They fit true to size and they are super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Cone

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a gift and for someone that doesn’t believe in the ugg hype, he liked them. Soft and true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Looks like photo, but no arch suport if that's what you need.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son and they happen to fit me as well! Love them, just no arch support in these.
customer_reviews.author: Shelz

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my fiancé for Valentine’s Day and he absolutely loves them! He won’t travel without them or walk around the house without them! It’s kinda annoying but he feels they are the most comfortable house shoe he has ever warn
customer_reviews.author: whitley steward

customer_reviews.title: Love My UGG’s
customer_reviews.text: My brother loves his shoes he says that the only thing that could be better is about 1/4 or less of an inch type of wedge heel for men.... But great
customer_reviews.author: Gaynel Jones

customer_reviews.title: Delivered in excellent condition & when expected.
customer_reviews.text: No dislikes. Ordered this at a friend’s request. He had worn out a previous pair. He smiled from ear to ear when he opened package. Says fit is perfect & slippers Give his feet the comfort he expected. His job requires him to walk almost all day.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Wright

customer_reviews.title: He loves them.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my guy since we are quarantined. This is his first pair of Uggs. He loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon J

customer_reviews.title: Not true to size, leaves black on foot!!!
customer_reviews.text: If you want slippers that flatten like a pancake after 2 steps, leave your heel hanging off the back, and leave black scuff marks all over your feet, then these are it. Wish I could return them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great & true to size
customer_reviews.text: yes i am a man who bought ugg slippers! lol. theyre great, feel soft and true to size... im a US size 12
customer_reviews.author: Charley

customer_reviews.title: Super Comfortable, Quality in question
customer_reviews.text: These were amazingly comfortable, fit just as expected (12US for like a 12US). Although when I got my first pair the leather sole started peeling off after 3 days. I returned it and am waiting for a different pair. I am hoping it was just a mess up on one pair of slippers. Am buying again to see if my theory is true or not. But I cannot emphasize enough how comfortable they are and that they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Austin LeTexier

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The slipper fit ok, just lousy craftsmanship. Disappointed, as UGG products are usually well made and very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: Ugg slippers
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing ugg slippers for years now and I finally gifted these for my boyfriend. He loves them! Comfiest shoes for indoors or walking in our building. Definitely recommend ugg slippers to all my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Isa

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shoe (slipper)
customer_reviews.text: I recently ordered a new pair and absolutely love them. My old pair lasted 12 years and I wear them inside and out. Easy to walk the dog and then wipe your feet to come inside. LOVE UGG!
customer_reviews.author: CAC HUNTER

customer_reviews.title: Love them!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love uggs. Most comfortable thing to wear around the house especially these. Highly recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Whitmore

customer_reviews.title: Looks exactly as anticipated and it’s Uggs!
customer_reviews.text: Love the look and feel of this house slipper. It is exactly what I was looking for. I know this gift will beloved!
customer_reviews.author: Gina B

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable but not functional
customer_reviews.text: Make your feet happy but don’t work so well for walking. As walking is a pretty crucial function of shoes, I returned mine. But they did make my feet feel like they were stuffed in a barrel of warm puppies 🐶
customer_reviews.author: Pluto

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, easy to wear
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved these. He really likes that they’re slip on so he can take on and off easily. Because they don’t have a back they provide warmth but don’t overheat his feet like some of the other slippers he’s had.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Rose

customer_reviews.title: GREAT FIT, GREAT PRODUCT IN PAST SO I BOUGHT AGAIN
customer_reviews.text: GREAT FIT, GREAT PRODUCT IN PAST SO I BOUGHT AGAIN
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Got these slippers for my husband,he loves the way it fits his feet like a glove,it feels like it hugs your feet,he tried them on and didn’t want to take them off. Thinking to buy other colors in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Jasha Siu

customer_reviews.title: Warm & Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Warm & Comfy Slippers! I’ve bought 2 pairs now.. one for my son and one for me. Extremely satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Jenni B

customer_reviews.title: Ugh slippers made me a believer
customer_reviews.text: Literally the best slippers I’ve ever had. I only bought slippers because my house has hardwood floors and it can be an adventure with just socks on. These ugg slippers are so warm and comfortable that I bought my wife a pair. I’m officially a slipper wearer after previously not being interested in them at all.
customer_reviews.author: DCGT Boss

customer_reviews.title: Soft and keeps your feet warm, very important.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his ugg slippers and wears them all the time while in the 6211 Chehalis Ln. He is very picky what he wears but these were a winner the minute he put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Justmejean

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect gift. The person I got them for was a non-UGG...not anymore!
customer_reviews.author: Leese

customer_reviews.title: Love an Aussie
customer_reviews.text: Great slipper, just tight and not as wide as I thought.
customer_reviews.author: Joe M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect men’s slipper
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slippers. My husband loves these and my 16 and 21 yr old sons liked them so much that I ordered them the day after Christmas and they got them in one day. Authentic Uggs. Fit slightly snippy at first. Very comfortable. Bought all three pair in espresso color.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea L. Neyland

customer_reviews.title: Too Narrow
customer_reviews.text: Should come in EE and EEE. It does not. Ok for a low value house slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Luap

customer_reviews.title: Might not be Real Uggs
customer_reviews.text: Im not sure if they are the original ones because i recieved mine in just a bag had no taggs so idk is there a way to find out?
customer_reviews.author: araceli franco

customer_reviews.text: they were a gift and he loved them, thank you I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Soto

customer_reviews.title: Great slippers!
customer_reviews.text: Great slippers. This is my 3rd pair. So comfortable and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hairapetian

customer_reviews.title: We love UGG products
customer_reviews.text: We did have to return this item because it was to big. The product was good quality.
customer_reviews.author: aeh

customer_reviews.title: Love these slippers!
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable and warm to walk around the house. Like how I can just slip them on and off. Would definitely recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Justin N

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: My son in law loved these slippers. And they fit him very well and he loved the comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: I'm lovin them
customer_reviews.text: Even though I live in Florida I still find these slippers the best.
customer_reviews.author: DJD

customer_reviews.title: comfy
customer_reviews.text: second pair. first one lasted about 3 years. these are extremely comfortable. great
customer_reviews.author: Sye!

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed :(
customer_reviews.text: My product seems used. There's scratches all over the top of one slipper and the material is worn down. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: JayandClem

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: These slippers are definitely not worth the $80 I paid for them! Not as fluffy as they looked in the picture. If these had not been in someone’s Christmas list, I would not have purchased them. Paying for the name. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Simons

customer_reviews.title: Over priced for quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: Was too small, provided no comfort. If I'm going to spend this much on house shoes, they better be comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Nita Brown

customer_reviews.title: So warm & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for cruising the house and I have even dared to wear them in public because they are so cute!
customer_reviews.author: Desiree cook

customer_reviews.title: Not comfy/not plush
customer_reviews.text: These are not plush on the inside. Disappointed in the quality of the inside of the slipper.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn coleman

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Got for my dad and wears them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: greg waite

customer_reviews.title: Great cold weather slippers
customer_reviews.text: Perfect gift for cold mornings. They keep your feet toastie warm.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Great quality. True to size. Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Hubby loved these slippers as a Birthday gift! They are such good quality. I would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Dorothy Martin

customer_reviews.title: Whats not to like,? the name says it all.
customer_reviews.text: Its a great quality slipper that should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: J.B. Larson

customer_reviews.title: He loved them!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my man and he loved them. He loved the color (even though I liked the tan ones). He said they were very comfortable and made his feet really warm. The only issue is the slippers come in whole sizes so I had to order a half size up which made them just a little big but overall great slippers.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality
customer_reviews.text: Have had these slippers for 4 months and the wool footbed is already worn bare, down to the underlying material. Have had a few pairs of these slippers over the years and it seems that the quality has gone downhill.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Bush

customer_reviews.title: They're Fine Just Bought Wrong Style
customer_reviews.text: Had to return because of style. They slip off. Need a backing.
customer_reviews.author: ChantelCarter

customer_reviews.title: Best Slippers
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. He’s tried other slippers (because let’s face it, they are pricey) but prefers these because the comfort is unparalleled. Now that he’s got his Ugg Slippers, he definitely says they’re worth the price. They wear well and look good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: UGG Men's Scuff Slipper
product_meta.description: This luxe house slipper showcases UGG® heritage with soft suede and sumptuous sheepskin. Easy to wear and extremely comfortable, the scuff is your go-to lounge style.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately not_applicable from arch
